title: Other Earthing Arrangements
fullText: Where it is intended to provide fault protection by the method of electrical separation, protective earthing conductors and equipotential bonding conductors shall be arranged in accordance with the requirements of Clause 7.4.
additionalRequirement: The earthing arrangements of the following systems should be independent systems; however, if they are connected to the electrical installation earthing system they should not reduce the integrity of the electrical installation protective earthing system.
notes: Requirements for the installation of protective earthing and bonding conductors for the above systems may be contained in other Standards.
